ing: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen corn kernels, thawed and drained
des: "This is my Grandmother's recipe that I'm always asked to bring to dinners.  If I'm going to a picnic I just put everything into a crock pot and 4 hours later it is ready to go."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).  Grease a 2 quart casserole dish.
In a large bowl combine corn, milk, egg, butter, sugar, flour, salt and pepper.  Mix well and transfer to prepared casserole dish.
Bake, uncovered, in preheated oven for 1 hour.
